strings.Value: "Monsters near peaceful villages. That's bad. Very bad."
"I wish I knew where they came from. It might be some magical phenomenon, or a great migration brought on by natural causes."
"Life can be cruel and we all face our share of tragedy. But we'll do everything we can to defeat this menace!"
"Peasants certainly sate the appetite! And they're easy to cook, ha ha! They even bring their own cutlery â€” axes to cut them up with, and pitchforks to eat from."
"Monsters prowling openly among the houses of the peaceful peasants. This cannot be a natural event. There's an evil will at work."
"Monsters prowling openly among the houses of the peaceful peasants. This cannot be a natural event. There's an evil will at work."
